thread.title: Utley not in Dodgers' lineup for Game 3 vs Mets
thread.title_full: Utley not in Dodgers' lineup for Game 3 vs Mets

title: Utley not in Dodgers' lineup for Game 3 vs Mets
text:
FCC Public File Utley not in Dodgers' lineup for Game 3 vs Mets (AP Photo/Gregory Bull). New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada, goes over the top of Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley who broke up a double play during the seventh inning in Game 2 of baseball's National League Division Series, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 i... (John McCoy/Los Angeles Daily News via AP). New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada falls after a slide by Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley during the seventh inning of an NL Division Series baseball game Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Los Angeles. By RONALD BLUMAP Baseball Writer 
NEW YORK (AP) - Chase Utley was not in the Los Angeles Dodgers' starting lineup for Game 3 of their NL Division Series against the New York Mets on Monday night. 
Instead of Utley, Los Angeles manager Don Mattingly started Howie Kendrick at second. 
Utley appealed his two-game suspension assessed by Major League Baseball on Sunday night for an illegal slide in Game 2, which broke the right leg of Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada. The appeal meant the penalty could not start until after a hearing and a decision. 
Kendrick is 1 for 6 against Mets Game 3 starter Matt Harvey, while Utley is 6 for 18.
